page.description: Alpha Anywhere's' Action Javascript builders make it very easy to create buttons that open other grids, reports, pages, and more in pop-up windows. You can also open them up in new "panes" in the tabbed UI builder.

section.description: In the two videos below, you'll see some of the window options such as multiple modeless windows, re-using the same modeless window, setting the window title, or opening a new pane in the tabbed UI object.
